lines.i: Information on whether the mother suffered from one or more of a list of recognized maternal morbidities during the labor and delivery process.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.34"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:261)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:264)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:262)/@code="73781-7" Maternal morbidity (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:477)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it records the nature of the maternal morbidity about which information is provided.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:265), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet STATIC (CONF:478)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:261)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:264)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:262)/@code="73781-7" Maternal morbidity (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:477)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it records the nature of the maternal morbidity about which information is provided.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:265), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet STATIC (CONF:478)
